259: He aha te tikanga mō MEGA
260: He ingoa puta haere e tohua ana "MEGA urunga whānui i whakamaua"
261: He aha te kaupapa a MEGA
262: Ko MEGA he momo kaitiaki i te rangi. Ka hoatu utu kore, utu hoki hei urunga ki te tiaki wāhi tiaki aratuku i te ipurangi. Ka tukuna koe kia tiaki, kia uru rānei ki āū kōnae mai i tō ipurangi mā tō taupānga kiritaki hono
264: Ki a mātau mōhiotanga, ko te tiaki ao me te whakamau kei roto i te ture.  Whakamahia te ture whaipānga me ngā ture whakahaere kei [B] me pēhea [/B] te whakamahi tiaki ao me te whakamau me a mātau [A] kaupapa whakamahi [/A]
265: I hangaia a MEGA e ngā tāngata nā rātau rā i whakahaere  i tētahi o ngā tino tiaki pakihi, i te rangi, nui o te ao
266: Ninipa noa kāore he urunga ki ngā rawa i hangaia e ōna kaimahi i mua rā. Kāore he herenga ture kāore hoki he whakahaere anō o ngā waehere, ngā pūmāro, me ngā raraunga koia nā e kore mātau e kite māramatanga ki te kukume mai i āu raraunga i mahia e koe.
267: He aha i whakatipuria ai he kamupene 'tiaki i te rangi' i Aotearoa o ngā wāhi katoa
268: Kei ētahi atu tikanga nui, ko te ingoa Māori ko 'Aotearoa' ko te whakamāori 'te whenua o te ao mā ao roa'
269: Ka taea e au te uru atu ki a MEGA mā runga waea pūkoro?
270: Kua tinohia a MEGA mō tō ipurangi papa. Kei te mahia e mātau a MEGA kia tau katoa me ngā tino waea pūkoro me nga tēpūiti.  Ka whiwhi tino taupānga koe mō tō tino waea pūkoro a muri ake nei
271: Ka taea e au te whakatimata i ngā aketia me ngā ihotia aukatinga
272: Ae. i te mea kaore i katia e koe to ripa ipurangi, nga aketia me nga ihotia a timata aunoa i muri, hei tauira,te aukatinga kōtuitui, ko te ararau o tō taputapu kua tū kua moe rānei. Maumahara ko ā mātau tūmau ka whakakore aunoa ngā aketia i kore i oti  pau noa  te whā tekau mā waru hāora
273: Ka taea e au te aketia o taua kōnae e hia kē wā
274: Nā te mea e kore ā mātau tūmau e kite i te ingoa kōnaeme whakatika te tukinga ki te taha kiritaki. Mā te mahi noa, me kā aketia he kōpae kei tō pūkete ( he rite te ara arotahi/ingoa kōpae, rite te rahi, rite te whakahounga wā mutunga, i piua, otirā kāore he mea hei aukati kia whiwhi kōnae nui atu, kōpae ingoa rite rānei i te kōpae tahi
275: Me pēhea te whakamana mahi aratuku
276: Ko tā mātau kaupapa kia kaua e mahi aukati noa ki ā  mātau kaimahi me pā rawa ki ngā mahi kūititanga o roto. Koia nā ka pupuri mātau i te mana ki te whakapōtae i te mahi aratuku, mō ngā whakahaere te take, i te wā ahakoa ki ia pūtakenga IP. Ko tō rārangi nuku ka timata aunoa ka heke haere te kuititanga. Kāore he mahi whakatika  ā-ringa nei
277: He aukatinga i te rahi o te kōnae kei a MEGA?
278: E kore mātau e mahi aukatinga noa i ngā kotinga kōnae otirā kei waho ko te wāhi e wātea ana i te wāhi puku ao. Tērā anō ētahi o te wā , me ērā ipurangi āhua hapa me whāngai hāngai atu te kōnae katoa kia tiakina i te pūmahara e ihotia ai (Firefox, IE10, Opera), rānei, mō te aketia me te ihotia  (IE9, Safari 5)
279: E kore e taea e au te aketia me te ihotia i te wā kotahi?
280: Ae. Kotahi aketia ā kotahi ihotia ki ia ripā ipurangika taea te oma whakarara
281: He aha i kore ai i hoatu i te karakōnui atahanga, i hoatu rānei i ngā tuku rerenga kōrero kōnae whitiahua, kōnae pūoro hoki?
282: Nā te otinga ki te otinga  tauira whakamunatanga ka aukati i te rāwekeweke taha tūmau o āū raraunga, hei mea hiahiatia hei whakamahi i taua āhuatanga
283: Me pēhea e taea e au te aketia i ngā kōnae
284: E toru ngā momo aketia o nga kōnae ki MEGA mā te whakamahi i te mata ipurangi
285: Patohia te pātene whero kei te whārangi timata
286: Haere ki tō kaitiaki kōnae ka pato i te "aketia te kōnae" rānei (ki te mahi koe i a Chrome) "aketia te kōpae pātene kei runga ake
287: Ko ngā kōnae toia&taka rānei (ki te mahi i a Chrome) ko ngā kōpae ki te wāhi
288: Me pēhea e whakaurua e au a MEGA
289: Kāore he mahi whakauru i te tahi mea. Kei te ipurangi a MEGA a mahi ai i roto i te nuinga o ngā tino ipurangi. Ki te tino tuku i a MEGA e tino tono ana mātau ki a koe kia mahia ko Google Chrome anake
290: Me pēhea te whakamahi i te tūari kōpae?
291: Ka taea e koe te tūari peka rākau o tō puku ao me o hoa, whānau, hoa mahi tahi rānei. Ka tono mā runga wāhitau īmērā. Ko te kaipōwhiri kore pūkete i naia nei ka whiwhi pānui īmērā me te hono kia tohua akeTērā anō ka taea me te mahi i tētahi hono ōkawa ki tētahi o āū kōpae ka tuku i te kī tino waehere kōpae kia uru noa me te kore pūkete MEGA. Kia noho ai ki a koe te taumahatanga tiaki tuku i te kī kōpae ki te kaiwhiwhi.
292: Ki te whakatū, tīni, tango, tuari rānei, ngāwari noa, pato matautia te kōpae o tō tiakitanga kōnae ka whiria te Tūari. E toru ngā taumata: Pānui anake, pānui/tuhi (ka taea te whakauru kōnae engari e kore e taea te tango), me te katoa (ka taea te whakauru me te tango i ngā kōnae
293: Me i purua e koe he wāhitau īmērā kāore nei he pūkete, me tomo koe ki te tuihono kotahi wā i muri i te otinga a te kaiwhiwhi i te tukanga haina kia taea ai te tuhi huna i te tūari huna ki tōna kī ōkawa e hanga houtia nei
294: Me pēhea e mukua te tangata i aku kōpae tūari?
295: Mea ngāwari me pato matautia ki te kōpae kei tō kaitiaki kōnae me tō tūari whiringa. Ka kite koe i ngā tāngata katoa e āhei ana ki tō kōpae tūari. Pato matautia te tangata ā ka whiri i te muka rānei mai i tō tāhua
296: Me pēhea e kitea e au aku kōpae tūari?
297: Ko ngā kōpae tūari kei tō kaitiaki kōnae kei te whiwhi i tētahi tino ata me te kakau kei raro i te kōpae
298: Ka taea e au te tūari i te kopae i tūaritia me au?
299: Kāo. Ko ngā kōpae i tuaritia e kore e taea te nuku.
302: Me pēhea au e hono ai ki te kōnae i a MEGA
303: Tuatahi, he kupu whakatūpato. Ko te haumaru whakamuna a o kōnae he mea me pā pea te matatapu o te kī tuhihuna whai pānga. Me pono whakamaua mā te aho tiaki anake. Hei tauira, ko ngā īmērā paerewa ehara i te mea tino pai.
304: Me ēnei i whakaarohia, whiria kia kotahi kia tini rānei ngā kōnae i tō kaitiaki kōnae, katahi ka pato matau ka whakamahi i a 'Tikina Honotia'. He kōrero me ngā (te) hono ōkawa ki ngā (te)  kōnae i whiria e koe ka huakinaKa taea e koe te tuku ia hono anake me ia kī anake ka taea hoki te tuku hono tahi
305: Me pēhea e mahi ai te tuhihuna?
306: Ko ngā tuhihuna katoa he otinga ki te otinga. Ko ngā raraunga i aketia i tuhihunatia i te taputapu aketia i mua i te tononga ki te ipurangi, ā ko ngā raraunga i ihotia i tuhihuna koretia anake i muri i te taenga mai i runga i te taputapu ihotia. Ko ngā mīhini kiritaki kei te huri, hohoko, tiaki i ngā kī tuhihuna. E kore ngā kī tuhihuna e taea te whakamahi e puta noa i ngā rorohiko kiritaki (engari hoki ko ngā kī ōkawa RSA)
307: Ko ōkū ake pārongo katoa ka tuhihunahia?
308: Kāo. Ko ngā raraunga kōnae me ngā ingoa kōnae/kōpae ka tuhihunahia. Ko ngā pārongo ā tātau i hiahia uru mahi ai,  pērā o tō wāhitau īmērā. anga kōpae. kokoraho kōnae me ngā tohumana utu, ka tiakina, ka whakaputaina tuhihuna kore. Tirohia ā mātau kaupapa tūmataiti mō ngā mokamoka
309: Kei te tino haumarutia aku raraunga i tiakina?
310: Ko ngā haumaru katoa he mea noa. Kei te ora tonu ēnei kawenga kōkiri - ehara noa nei nā MEGA anake otirā e hiahia ana mātau kia matatau koe ki ngā raruraru
311: Ko ngā pūkete a te takitahi ka raruraru ma te:
312: Ngā mahi tūtei i tō rorohiko. He kīurua ngāwari ka nui tēnā, otirā ko te tohumana wāhanga me te kī ka taea te wewete mai i te pūmahara i te pūnaha kōnae
313: Kei tō pokohiwi. Kaua e pato i tō kupuuru me he tangata kei te titiro ki ō pato kī.
314: Tino kaha kupuuru. Me tino pakari te kupuuru
315: Whiwhinga. Tautokona i ngā wā katoa te tūnga haumaru o tō hono (https://) me te ingoa rohe tika (mega.co.nz) i mua i tō whakauru kupuuru
316: Ka taea te whakatū kōkiri tino nui ma te:
317: Te kōkiri 'tangata i waenganui'. Me tuku he tiwhikete SSL tārua whaimana ka hono tahitia me te kape tahae i te DNS me/rānei te kōkiri i ā mātau ara BGP (he DigiNotar momo āhua)
318: Kia uru ai ki te kaihautū tūmau tukutuku https://mega.co.nz/index.html me te tīni i taua kōnae me te momo kape tahae ( e kore tēnei e aukati urunga ma te pūtake taupanga i whakaurua rā) He tūpato mā te rāweke i ngā kiko kei a mātau CDN kiko tū  tuku ehara i te raru haumaru, na te mea ko ngā kiko ora tonu i whakaurua mai i index.html he mea i manahia e te tuhihuna # (whakaarohia me he 'putu haumaru' mō ngā paetukutuku) Ko tēnei momo kōkiri me āta tono waehere kino ki te kiritaki. Koia nā ka kitea
319: Hei urunga ki tō matau tino anga tūmau me te hanga tono kī tāhae kei ngā tūari ora. Ko tēnei momo kōkiri anake e pā ana ki ngā raraunga kei ngā kōpae tūari ā ka kitea i te taha kiritaki hoki
320: He aha me i kore au i whakapono ki a koe? He mea haumaru tonu te whakamahi i a MEGA?
321: Me i kore koe i whakapono ki a mātau, e kore e taea e koe te whakahaere i te waehere i tukuna e mātau ahakoa, ā ma te whakapūare i tā mātau pae i tō pūtiro me te whakauru kupuuru he mea kore whakaaetia. Ki te hiahia tonu koe ki te whakamahi i a MEGA me mahi tahi koe me te  taupanga kiritaki i tuhia e tētahi hoa pono
322: E whakapono ana au ki a koe me tō pūraraunga o Aotearoa, otirā e kore au e whakapono ki tō pūraraunga  Tiamana, kei te whakahaeretia hoki e tētahi kamupene Amerikana (US)
323: Ae, ka taea e koe te whakamahi haumaru i a MEGA, ahakoa i tino here tahitia ā mātau tūmau i Tiamana. Kei te whakatika te pūraraunga o Aotearoa kia kore ai te waehere i tahaetia e mahi  e haere nā koe ki https://mega.co.nz
324: Ko ngā raraunga i whāngaitia ki ngā kōpae tūari kei te haumarutia pērā i ērā o aku raraunga
325: Kōpae tūari, tōna āhua hoki, he mea haumaru pērā i te mema haumaru iti. Otirā tērā anō tētahi raru a te mahi tahi a ā mātau anga tūmau pū. Ka taea te rāweke i ngā kī ōkawa me ngā tono kī ka taea te kape ka tāhae.
326: Whakaarohia ko te tiaki pū a MEGA i mahi tahitia a-tinana nei. He aha te raru?
327: He pānui hapa i muri i te rāweke ihotia o ngā kōnae. Ahakoa i te kaikōkiri te kī tuhihuna mo te tino kōnae o taua pū, e kore tonu e taea e ia te tīni kī mā te mea i tāhaetia  ā e kore hoki e hinga i ngā ihotanga i muri mai
328: He mea pai te tiaki i aku raraunga i te wāhi kotahi
329: Me tiakina ngā tino kōnae mahuenga,  tuihono me tuimotu. Ahakoa tiakina ia kōnae i ngā wāhi e rua, kāore he kupu taurangi mō te tini hapa tahi me te kaha  tūkino anōtia a te kāwanatanga
330: He aha ai i tukuna aku raraunga ki a koe o tātau katoa.
331: Ka tukuna e mātau ki a koe te kaitiaki  tuhihuna (UCE) ko koe hoki te kaitiaki i ngā kī.  Ko te whakamahi UCE he mea puna pūare, nā hoki ka tono mātau ki te hapori kia tirohia ka whakautua mai. E whakapono ana mātau ma tēnei he mea haumaru ake mō te tiaki i au raraunga ma te kaiwhakawhiwhi me te taha tūmau tuhihuna ki reira tiakina ai ngā kī e ISP ā kino ake kore kau he tuhihuna - me, hei tauira, i wātea ngā kōpae kaiwhakamahi a MEGA ohorere noa ka uru kore kupuuru nā te hapa hōtaka, e kore e taea te pānui me kore he ki tuhihuna kore a te kaiwhakamahi
332: Kei te kite au kei te whakamahia e koe a HTTPS hei nuku i ngā raraunga kōnae tuhihuna kua oti  Kua mutu kē tēnā?
333: Aua noa ko te nuinga o ngā pūtiro e kino ana ki ngā here haumaru kore mai i te whārangi haumaru, ā mā wai rātau e whakahē - e kore rātau e tino matau ki te pono kei reira ano tētahi apa tuhihuna e mahi ana.  Nā te mea  ko HTTPS e patu kino ana i te kaha, ka tukuna kia katia e koe i ngā pūtiro tuku noa (ehara a Internet Explorer i tētahi o ēnā) kia tere ake te tuku me te kore tūkino i te muna  me te pono o āū raraunga.  Ka kite koe i te whakatūpato SSL e whiti ana i tō nuku kōnae tuatahi i ētahi pūtiro - i tēnei ( ko ia anake) kēhi, he mea haumaru te tuku noa.

336:

620: Pānui i te hara tutuki kore
622: E whakautehia  e MEGA ngā manatā ā ētahi atu, me te hiahia kia pērā ano ngā kaiwhakamahi ō ngā ratonga Ao. Ka whakautua e mātau ngā pānui hara tutuki kore o te manatā e whai ana i te ture whaipānga me te tika tuku mai ki ā mātau. Me e pono ana koe i mahia i kapehia āu hua me te takahi i tō hara tutuki kore o te manatā  tukuna mai ēnei pārongo: (1) he hainatanga ā-ringa ā-hiko rānei o te kaimanatā o te tangata rānei kei a ia tō mana ā-ringa. (11) he kape o te mahi manatā i hara tutuki koretia rā (111) he kape o ngā papānga e kiia ana kei te hara tutuki koretia te manatā, he mea e pātia e ēnei tukitukinga hei whakakore hei kotinga urunga atu, me ngā pārongo e pai ana kia tukuna mātau kia kitea ai ngā mea hei tauira pērā i ngā URL (kimi rauemi rite)(IV) Au pārongo hono atu, pērā i tō wāhi tau, tō nama waea me tō imērā wāhi tau(V) He tuhinga nāu e whakapono ana koe ko to whakamahi rauemi e tohetia nā kāore i tukuna te mana a te  kaimanatā, tana māngai, e te ture rānei  me(Vi) he  tuhinga ko te pārongo kei te pānui e tika ana, ā, he pānga tipatipa tā te ture (ko tā te ture anake ka tuku) i tukuna ki a  koe te mana kia tu hei māngai mō te kaimanatā
623: Kei te pupuri mātau i te mana ki te tango raraunga e meatia ana kei te tūkino me te kore tuku pānui, ka noho ki a mātau me te kore utu ki a koe.  I te wā tika, ka katia e mātau tō pūkete menā ka rite tonu tō hara. Ko tā mātau māngai kaimanatā i huaina mō te  titiro i te kaitukino pea nana i tūkino i te manatā ,
625: Whakamahia tēnei tuhinga ka tuku atu i te pānui manatā. Ka whakautua e mātau i roto i te 24 hāora. (ināia tonu nei i ngā hāora pakihi)
629: Takahi i te manatā ā tetahi atu ko au nei tana māngai i raro i te ture.

636: E mārama ana ahau ka murua aku hapa, pērā i ngā utu, me ngā utu rōia, me i tino mōhio i tino tipatipahia e ahau te hua ripōata, te URL, ngā kōnae  e takahi nei.

671: He nui ngā reo e korerotia ana e koe?
674: E kore e taea te ata rāwekeweke i te tumataiti ā te takitahi, ā te whanau, ā te kainga, ā ngā reta rānei.  Me whiwhi ngā tāngata katoa i te tiakitanga a te ture mai i aua rāwekeweke
675: Whakapūākitanga Whānui  o ngā Mana o te Tangata
676: Ko MEGA he tiakitanga Ao whiwhi Tumataiti kaha tino mataara
677: Ka whakawhiwhi tiakitanga i te Ao a MEGA. He mea pai tino mataara ki nga tumataiti.  E whakapono ana a MEGA ki to tino tumataitinga a ka hoatu i ngā taputapu hangarau hei tiaki. E kiia nei e mātau Kaiwhakamahi Tuhihuna Tiaki KTT (UCE), mahi aunoa nei.
678: He aha a Kaiwhakamahi Tuhihuna Tiaki (KTT)
679: Ko nga konae tiaka kei a MEGA kei te tuhihunatia. Ko nga hua nuku mai atu ki a MEGA kei te tuhihunatia. Ahakoa rite te nuinga a nga kaihoatu tiaki ao he rereke a MEGA - ko te rereketanga i nga pakihi noa e pupuri nei i te ki tuhihuna  kei a koe ke te ki tuhihuna, kei a koe hoki te mana pupuri,  mana tuku ranei i o konae kore  kau hoki he pumanawa haumaru kore hei whangai atu. Kei roto i to tukutuku e mahi ana.
681: Ko te ao MEGA ko te timatatanga mō āpōpō, ka hoatu KTT (UCE) ki tō tukutuku mō ētahi tautono nui rerekē kāore he mahi whakauru. Ka tiakina e ā mātau hangarau āū imērā, karanga, kōrero me ō tuku whitiahua
693: He hunga hangarau piri pono mātau i whai wāhi,  painga me te urunga ki te ipurangi ki te hanga i ētahi tino ratonga tūari ao hei tiaki i tō tūmataitinga. I hangaia e mātau tēnei hōtaka ratonga ipurangi mai i te timatanga i  Tamaki makau rau. Aotearoa.  Kore e pērā ki ērā o ō mātau hoa whakataetae, kei te whakamahia e mātau tētahi  tino ipurangi hou  i puta i ngā mahi hangarau tuhihuna ā ko koe kei  te pupuri i ngā ki ehara ko mātau. Ko te hunga hoahoa ko Kim Dotcom, ko Mathias Ortmann, ko Bram van der Kolk me Finn Batato. Ko tā mātau CEO ko Tony Lentino. He tohunga tiaki rēhita rohenga i te ao.  Ko te tūmanaako ka pai ki a koutou katoa.
